FuncDef: This command configures the IPv6 prefix of the BR (dmr-prefix), which is used as a default MAP rule (route) in the CEs. Each MAP domain in the VSR has a unique dmr-prefix.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the IPv6 prefix associated with a MAP domain in the BR. The prefix represents a dmr-rule in the CE. Values-<ipv6-prefix/prefix-length> :.
